Hymn.Arabic: أعظمك يارب لأنك احتضنتنى, ولم تشمت بى أعدائى.
Hymn.English: 30:1 I will extol You, O Lord, for You have lifted me up, And have not let my foes rejoice over me.

Hymn.Arabic: أيها الرب الهى صرخت إليك فشفيتنى.
Hymn.English: 2 O Lord my God, I cried out to You, And You healed me.

Hymn.Arabic: يارب أصعدت نفسى من الجحيم هللويا
Hymn.English: 3 O Lord, You brought my soul up from the grave.     Alleluia
